Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Holiday Inn Lisbon, you'll be centrally located in Lisbon, steps from Instituto Superior Tecnico and minutes from Culturgest. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Saldanha Square and Atrium Saldanha.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 169 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and a seasonal outdoor pool. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. This hotel has 7 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and a seasonal outdoor pool. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.
Make yourself at home in one of the 169 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

With a stay at Holiday Inn Lisbon, you'll be centrally located in Lisbon, steps from Instituto Superior Tecnico and minutes from Culturgest. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Saldanha Square and Atrium Saldanha.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Instituto Superior Tecnico - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Culturgest - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Saldanha Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Atrium Saldanha - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Dolce Vita Shopping Monumental Mall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Campo Pequeno Bullring - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Dr. Anastacio Goncalves Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Maria Matos Municipal Theater - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Hospital Curry Cabral - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Hospital Dona Estefania - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Gulbenkian Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Center for Modern Art - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
El Corte Ingles Shopping Center - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Edward VII Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Marques de Pombal Square - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Lisbon is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Please note: Swimming pool is opened from 1 May to 31 October City tax is not included in the rate, to be paid directly at the hotel. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
